defaultStep.description:
The initial value of the stepper when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the stepper.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The custom ids for the stepper elements

linear.description: If `true`, the stepper requires the user to complete the steps in order

onStepChange.description: Callback to be called when the value changes

onStepComplete.description: Callback to be called when a step is completed

step.description: The controlled value of the stepper
